text: When domestic abusers have easy access to guns, the result can be fatal. Gov. Sununu should work with the NH legislature to keep guns out of the hands of abusers. I wrote & passed the Violence Against Women Act. I’ve taken on the NRA twice — and as president, I’ll do it again.

Now more than ever, we need a president who will choose hope over fear.
